CmdLine: yaourt -Sy --noconfirm  nvm &&      yaourt -Sy --noconfirm grep &&    yaourt -Sy --noconfirm awk &&    echo 'source /usr/share/nvm/init-nvm.sh' >> ~/.bashrc &&    echo 'source /usr/share/nvm/init-nvm.sh' >> ~/.zshrc
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: source /usr/share/nvm/init-nvm.sh &&    yaourt -Sy --noconfirm tar &&    nvm install `nvm  ls-remote --lts |grep -P -o  v[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+ | tail -1 ` &&    nvm use `nvm  ls-remote --lts |grep -P -o  v[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+ | tail -1 `
Commands.Name: run
